bibl.title: The Poem of Empedocles. A Text and Translation with an Introduction. Revised Edition. (Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 39 = The Phoenix Presocratics. 3.)
bibl.note: 1e éd.: Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 29, Toronto - Buffalo - London, 1992. - Integrates the new material from P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)] with the previously known evidence. - See in part. pp. 19-21: The Evidence of the Papyrus; - 75-79: The Impact of the Papyrus.
bibl.seg: INWOOD Brad, The Poem of Empedocles. A Text and Translation with an Introduction. Revised Edition. (Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 39 = The Phoenix Presocratics. 3.)
Toronto - Buffalo - London, University of Toronto Press, 2001, 4°, xii-334 pp. ISBN 0-8020-4820-X (hbk) / 0-8020-8353-6 (pbk). $75 (hbk) / $29.95 (pbk).

1e éd.: Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 29, Toronto - Buffalo - London, 1992. - Integrates the new material from P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)] with the previously known evidence. - See in part. pp. 19-21: The Evidence of the Papyrus; - 75-79: The Impact of the Papyrus.
C.R. par Alain Martin, AntCl 71 (2002) pp. 257-258.
